original_text: The throne had six steps and a footstool of gold, which were attached to the throne, and on each side of the seat were armrests and two lions standing beside the armrests,
korean_text: 그 보좌에는 여섯 층계와 금 발판이 있어 보좌와 이어졌고 앉는 자리 양쪽에는 팔걸이가 있고 팔걸이 곁에는 사자가 하나씩 섰으며

sentences.korean_translation: 그 왕좌에는 여섯 개의 층계가 있었고

sentences.original_text: which were attached to the throne
and on each side of the seat were armrests
and two lions standing beside the armrests
sentences.korean_translation: 팔걸이 옆에는 두 마리의 사자가 서 있었습니다
